name: Karate
description: Karate is a Japanese martial art that focuses on striking techniques using punches, kicks, knee strikes, and open-hand techniques.

name: Taekwondo
description: Taekwondo is a Korean martial art known for its dynamic kicking techniques, emphasizing speed and agility.

name: Judo
description: Judo is a Japanese martial art that focuses on grappling techniques and throws, utilizing an opponent's strength and momentum.

name: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu
description: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu is a grappling-based martial art that emphasizes ground fighting, submissions, and positional dominance.

name: Muay Thai
description: Muay Thai, also known as Thai boxing, is a combat sport from Thailand that utilizes strikes with fists, elbows, knees, and shins.

name: Kung Fu
description: Kung Fu refers to a wide range of Chinese martial arts styles that incorporate various techniques, forms, and philosophies.
